ai.desc: Starts with #wMindshatter, then #wFour #wArm #wStrike, then #wTormenting #wShackles, then #wInfernal #wPower. Afterwards, cycles #wMindshatter or #wTormenting #wShackles -> #wFour #wArm #wStrike -> the other -> #wHellfire.
ai.notes: Innate #uDevil's #uDue.

ai.desc: Cycles #wChaos #wZone -> #wRain #wDestruction -> #wDark #wWill (if either Spatial Phantasm or Temporal Phantasm are alive) or #wDark #wFlame's #wEmbrace (otherwise). NL NL If both phantasms are dead, #wChaos #wZone adds an extra Slimed status card.
ai.notes: Innate #uSpacetime #uMastery. NL NL Slimed status cards go into the discard pile.

ai.desc: Starts with #wGorge, then #wNibble and #wSalivate in either order. Afterwards, cycles all three moves in a random order each time.
ai.notes: Innate #uProtective #uMaw 45, #uFetid #uBody, #uSpore #uCloud 5. NL NL Contagion status cards go into the discard pile. NL NL #rN = 4 minus the number of living Lesser Devourers.
